objects.description: [Contagious Interview](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1052) has leveraged ClickFix type tactics enticing victims to copy and paste malicious code.(Citation: Sentinel One Contagious Interview ClickFix September 2025)(Citation: Sekoia ClickFake 2025)(Citation: Validin Contagious Interview North Korea ClickFix January 2025)
